name: Dragon Mission
description:
Calanguito sees his kingdom being attacked by the Order in Chaos. When saving his king from an abduction attempt he discovers that other kingdoms are also being attacked and he is incubated to save them as well.
Help Calanguito save his people from eternal chaos, in this unprecedented adventure in Dragonia. With more engaging simple combat, face the most diverse beings of this fantastic world.


Characteristics
- Dragons of various types
- Dynamic and simple combat system
- Pixelated Graphics
- High quality songs
- Levels with unique themes
- Trimming system parry

PROJECT PROMOTED WITH LAW RESOURCES
14.017 / 2020 - LAW ALDIR BLANC - THROUGH THE MUNICIPAL SECRETARIAT OF CULTURE OF
FORTALEZA
